question:
You have been living in a rental apartment for the past year. Recently a new neighbour moved in and has been making a lot of noise, which disturbs you.
Write a letter to the landlord. In your letter:
explain the situation
describe why it bothers you
suggest a solution
text: I am writing to bring your attention to a problem I am having with one of my neighbours.

Last month, Mr Johnson moved into the apartment, right next door to me.  He usually plays music late at night, often after midnight.  The music is very loud and I can easily hear the sound in my bedroom.  It makes it hard for me to fall asleep and get enough time to rest.  I have to get up at 6:00 A.M. in order to get to work on time.  Since I haven't been able to get enough sleep, it's becoming a serious problem for me.

I'm wondering that since Mr Johnson is new to the apartment, he is not very aware of the rules about noise at night.  I would really appreciate it if you could speak to him and remind him to keep the noise down as much as possible at night.
